info.title: Billbee API
info.description:
Documentation of the Billbee REST API to connect a Billbee account to external aplications.

## Endpoint

The Billbee API endpoint base url is https://app.billbee.io/api/v1 

## Activation

You have to enable the API in the settings of your Billbee account. In addition you need a Billbee API Key identifying the application you develop. To get an API key, send a mail to support@billbee.io and send us a short note about what you are building.

## Authorization & security

Because you can access private data with the Billbee API, every request has to be sent over https and must

* Contain a valid API Key identifying the application/developer. It has to be sent as the HTTP header X-Billbee-Api-Key
* Contain a valid user login with billbee username and api password in form of a basic auth HTTP header

## Throttling

Each endpoint has a throttle of max 2 requests per second per combination of API Key and Billbee user.

When you exceed these 2 calls, the API will return a HTTP 429 status code

get.summary: Get a list of all orders optionally filtered by date

parameters.name: minOrderDate
parameters.description: Specifies the oldest order date to include in the response

parameters.name: maxOrderDate
parameters.description: Specifies the newest order date to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page to request

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the pagesize. Defaults to 50, max value is 250

parameters.name: shopId
parameters.description: Specifies a list of shop ids for which invoices should be included

parameters.name: orderStateId
parameters.description: Specifies a list of state ids to include in the response

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Specifies a list of tags the order must have attached to be included in the response

parameters.name: minimumBillBeeOrderId
parameters.description: If given, all delivered orders have an Id greater than or equal to the given minimumOrderId

parameters.name: modifiedAtMin
parameters.description: If given, the last modification has to be newer than the given date

parameters.name: modifiedAtMax
parameters.description: If given, the last modification has to be older or equal than the given date.

parameters.name: articleTitleSource
parameters.description: The source field for the article title. 0 = Order Position (default), 1 = Article Title, 2 = Article Invoice Text

parameters.name: excludeTags
parameters.description: If true the list of tags passed to the call are used to filter orders to not include these tags

To create an order POST an JSON object to the orders endpoint with the shown properties.
Not all properties are required.

parameters.name: shopId
parameters.description: Deprecated, if orderData.ApiAccountId is set, it will be used instead of 'shopId'

400.description: Invalid data was received in the request

post.summary: Create an delivery note for an existing order. This request is extra throttled by order and api key to a maximum of 1 per 5 minutes.

parameters.description: The internal billbee id of the order

parameters.name: includePdf
parameters.description: If true, the PDF is included in the response as base64 encoded string

parameters.name: sendToCloudId
parameters.description: Optionally specify the id of a billbee connected cloud device to send the pdf to

post.summary: Create an invoice for an existing order. This request is extra throttled by order and api key to a maximum of 1 per 5 minutes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal billbee id of the order

parameters.name: includeInvoicePdf
parameters.description: If true, the PDF is included in the response as base64 encoded string

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: You can pass the id of an invoice template to overwrite the assigned template for invoice creation

parameters.name: sendToCloudId
parameters.description: You can pass the id of a connected cloud printer/storage to send the invoice to it

patch.summary: Updates one or more fields of an order

put.summary: Changes the main state of a single order
put.description:
### REMARKS ###
Use this call to change the state of an order to i.e. paid or sent.

The state is transfered to the external shop/marketplace if configured.
This is the list of known states:
- 1: ordered
- 2: confirmed
- 3: paid
- 4: shipped
- 5: reclamation
- 6: deleted
- 7: closed
- 8: canceled
- 9: archived
- 10: not used
- 11: demand note 1
- 12: demand note 2
- 13: packed
- 14: offered
- 15: payment reminder
- 16: fulfilling

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The internal id of the order

requestBody.description: The data used to change the state

Id.description: The Billbee Id of the customer

VatId.description: The vat-id, that should be saved at the customer. Only used if CustomerVatId is not set on the order.

ClientReference.description: Optional specify a text to be included on the label. Not possible with all carriers

Content.description: Optional specify a text describing the content of the shipment. Used for export shipments

OrderSum.description: The value of the shipments content

PrinterIdForExportDocs.description: The id of a connected Cloudprinter to sent the export docs to

PrinterName.description: The name of a connected Cloudprinter to sent the label to

ProductCode.description: The productcode to be used when creating the shipment. Values depends on the carrier used

ProviderName.description: The name of the provider as specified in the billbee account

Services.description: A list of services to be used when creating the shipment

ShipDate.description: Optional overwrite the shipdate to be transferred to the carrier

WeightInGram.description: Optional specify the weight in gram of the shipment

CountryCode.description: The ISO2 code of the country

CustomerId.description: The internal Billbee id of the customer the address belongs to

Id.description: The internal Billbee ID of the address record. Can be null if a new address is created
The Billbee Id of the customer

VatId.description: The vat-id, that should be saved at the customer. Only used if CustomerVatId is not set on the order.

ReservedAmount.description: The reserve (not fulfilled) qty of the article

AcceptLossOfReturnRight.description: Customer accepts loss due to withdrawal

ApiAccountId.description: Id of the account, this order belongs to

ApiAccountName.description: The name of the account, this order belongs to. Will be ignored on order creation.

BillBeeOrderId.description: The Order.Id from the Billbee database

BillBeeParentOrderId.description: The Id of the parent order in the Billbee database

Comments.description: All messages / comments of the order

ConfirmedAt.description: The date on which the order was confirmed

CreatedAt.description: The date on which the order was created

CustomInvoiceNote.description: An optional multiline text which is printed on the invoice

CustomerNumber.description: The customer number (not to be confused with the id of the customer)

CustomerVatId.description: The vat-id, that was given by the customer to fulfill this order

DeliverySourceCountryCode.description: An optional Country ISO2 Code of the country where order is shipped from (FBA)

DistributionCenter.description: An optional code for the distribution center delivering this order

Id.description: Id of the order in the external system (marketplace)

InvoiceDate.description: The date on which the invoice was created

InvoiceNumberPostfix.description: The postfix of the invoice number

InvoiceNumberPrefix.description: The prefix of the invoice number

IsCancelationFor.description: An optional Order Id (externalid) for an order if this is a cancel order (shopify only at the moment)

LanguageCode.description: The two-letter language code of the customer

LastModifiedAt.description: Date of the last update, the order got

MerchantVatId.description: The vat-id, that should be displayed on the invoice and other order documents

OrderItems.description: The list of items purchased like shirt, pant, toys etc

OrderNumber.description: Order number of the order in the external system (marketplace)

PayedAt.description: The date on which the order was paid

PaymentInstruction.description: A textfield optionaly filled with a payment instruction text for printout on the invoice (z.B. Ebay Kauf auf Rechnung)

PaymentReference.description: A payment reference. Should not be used any more. Please use 'Payments' instead.

PaymentTransactionId.description: The id of the payment transaction. For example the transaction id of PayPal payment. Should not be used any more. Please use 'Payments' instead.

ShipWeightKg.description: The total weight of the shipment(s)

ShippedAt.description: The date on which the order was shipped

ShippingProfileId.description: Internal Id for the shipping profile for that order

ShippingProfileName.description: Display Name of Shipping profile, if available

ShippingProviderId.description: Internal Id for the used shipping provider

ShippingProviderName.description: The Name for of used shipping provider

ShippingProviderProductId.description: Internal Id for the used shipping product

ShippingProviderProductName.description: The Name of the used shipping product

State.description: The current state of the order

TotalCost.description: The total cost excluding shipping cost

UpdatedAt.description: The date on which the order was last updated

VatMode.description: The vat mode of the order

Billbee.Interfaces.BillbeeAPI.Model.Orde.description: A class that represents the Billbee data model of a single order

Attributes.description: A list of product attributes for this position

BillbeeId.description: The billbee id of this item

DontAdjustStock.description: If true, the import of this order won't adjust the stock level at billbee.

GetPriceFromArticleIfAny.description: If true, the price will be overwritten by the known article price in billbee if available

InvoiceSKU.description: Contains the SKU from OrderDetail (if available) or from Product

IsCoupon.description: Determines if it is a coupon, which is interpreted as tax-free payment

ShippingProfileId.description: Determines if it is a coupon, which is interpreted as tax-free payment

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount in the total price

TransactionId.description: Id of the individual transaction. Only required by Ebay to detect aggregated orders

UnrebatedTotalPrice.description: Is just used for the billbee api

Id.description: The internal id of this attribute

BillbeeShopId.description: The Billbee internal id of the shop connection

BillbeeShopName.description: The name of shop connection in Billbee

Email.description: The email address of this customer

FirstName.description: The first name of this customer

FullName.description: The full name ("firstname lastname") of this customer

Id.description: The Billbee internal id of this customer

LastName.description: The last name of this customer

Nick.description: The nick name (if available) from the original system

Platform.description: The name of the platform from which this customer originated

ExternalId.description: The id of this image from the original system

IsDefaultImage.description: True if the image is / should be the default image

BillbeeId.description: The billbee internal id of the shipment

ShipmentType.description: Shipment Type, 0 if Shipment, 1 if Retoure

Shipper.description: The name of the shipping provider

ShippingCarrier.description: The carrier used to ship the parcel with

ShippingProviderId.description: The id of the used shipping provider

ShippingProviderProductId.description: The id of the used shipping provider product

TrackingUrl.description: The url to track this shipment

BillbeeId.description: The Billbee internal id of the linked product

CountryOfOrigin.description: The country where this article was made

EAN.description: The EAN / GTIN of this product

Id.description: The id of this product in the external system

IsDigital.description: True if the product is a digital good (download etc.), false if not

OldId.description:
This is for migration scenarios when the internal id of a product changes
I.E. Etsy when switching to the new inventory management, the ids for variants will change.

PlatformData.description: Optional platform specific Data as serialized JSON Object for the product

SkuOrId.description: The SKU of this product or the id if the SKU is empty

Weight.description: Weight of one item in gram

AutosubtractReservedAmount.description: Automatically reduce the NewQuantity by the currently not fulfilled amount

BillbeeId.description: Optional the ID of the Billbee product to update

ForceSendStockToShops.description: If true, every sent stockchange is stored and transmitted to the connected shop, even if the value has not changed

NewQuantity.description: The new absolute stock quantity for the product you want to set

Reason.description: Optional a reason text for the stock update

Sku.description: The SKU of the product to update

StockId.description: Optional the stock id if the feature multi stock is activated

CurrentStock.description: The new value for current stock after the update

Message.description: A human readable message that explains the result of the operation

SKU.description: The SKU of the article to update the current stock

UnfulfilledAmount.description: The value of the unfulfilled amount (reserved) of the article

CarrierId.description:
Optional the id of a shipping carrier that should be assigend to the shipment
Will override the carrier from the shipment product.
Please use the integer value from this Enumeration:
{Billbee.Interfaces.Shipping.Enums.ShippingCarrier}

Comment.description: Optional a text stored with the shipment

OrderId.description: Optional a differing order number of the shipment if available

ShippingProviderId.description: Optional the id of a shipping provider existing in the billbee account that should be assigned to the shipment

ShippingProviderProductId.description: Optional the id of a shipping provider product that should be assigend to the shipment

Rechnungsdruck.WebApp.Controllers.Api.Ap.description: Data of the shipment to be created

AcceptTerms.description: Set to true, if the user has accepted the Billbee terms & conditions

AffiliateCouponCode.description: Specifies an billbee affiliate code to attach to the user

DefaultCurrrency.description: Optionally specify the default currency of the user

DefaultVatIndex.description: Optionally specify the default vat index of the user

DefaultVatMode.description: Optionally specify the default vat mode of the user

EMail.description: The Email address of the user to create

Vat1Rate.description: Optionally specify the vat1 (normal) rate of the user

Vat2Rate.description: Optionally specify the vat2 (reduced) rate of the user

Rechnungsdruck.WebApp.Controllers.Api.Au.description: Data used to create a new Billbee user account

Country.description: The ISO2 country code of the users country

Rechnungsdruck.WebApp.Controllers.Api.Au.description: Represents the invoice address of a Billbee user

IsHtml.description: If true, the string will be handled as html.

Language.description: The ISO 639-1 code of the target language. Using default if not set.

TextToParse.description: The text to parse and replace the placeholders in.

Trim.description: If true, then the placeholder values are trimmed after usage.

DelayInMinutes.description: The delay in minutes until the rule is executed

Rechnungsdruck.WebApp.Controllers.Api.Or.description: Specifies the parameters used to set the new state of an order

ChangeStateToSend.description: Optional parameter to automatically change the orderstate to sent after creating the shipment

ClientReference.description: Optional specify a reference text to be included on the label. Works not with all carriers

OrderId.description: The Billbee internal id of the order to ship

PrinterName.description: Optional the name of a connected cloudprinter to send the label to

ProductId.description: the id of the shipping provider product to be used

ProviderId.description: The id of the provider. You can query all providers with the shippingproviders endpoint

ShipDate.description: Optional specify the shipdate to be transmitted to the carrier

WeightInGram.description: Optional the shipments weight in gram to override the calculated weight

X-Billbee-Api-Key.description: To identify the app developer, each API request has do contain a valid API Key in the HTTP header X-Billbee-Api-Key.
X-Billbee-Api-Key.name: X-Billbee-Api-Key

basic.description: To authenticate an API request, the Billbee username/email and an API password have to be provided as a BasicAuth header.
